trans-unit.source: Specifies the internal execution behavior of a service contract implementation.
trans-unit.target: 指定服務合約實作的內部執行行為。

trans-unit.source: Apply the ServiceBehaviorAttribute attribute to a service implementation to specify service-wide execution behavior.
trans-unit.target: ServiceBehaviorAttribute 屬性套用至服務實作，即可指定整個服務執行行為。

trans-unit.source: (To specify execution behavior at the method level, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute> attribute.) This attribute can be applied only to service implementations.
trans-unit.target: (若要指定方法層級上的執行行為，請使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute>屬性。)</xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute>這個屬性可以套用到服務實作。

trans-unit.source: For working examples, see the [Service Behaviors Samples](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4e3c6513-a7ff-4b35-8dcf-b5506c6f39a7).
trans-unit.target: 如需實用範例，請參閱[服務行為範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4e3c6513-a7ff-4b35-8dcf-b5506c6f39a7)。

trans-unit.source: ServiceBehaviorAttribute properties are a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programming model feature that enables common features that developers otherwise have to implement.
trans-unit.target: ServiceBehaviorAttribute 屬性[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]程式撰寫模型功能，可讓開發人員必須另外實作的通用功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these and other behaviors, see [Specifying Service Run-Time Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這些和其他行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[指定服務執行階段行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the underlying runtime properties that some of the following properties set, see [Extending ServiceHost and the Service Model Layer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關基礎執行階段屬性設定下列屬性的一些請參閱[擴充 ServiceHost 與服務模型層](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> property specifies the type of filter that the dispatcher system uses to locate the endpoint that handles requests.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>屬性會指定發送器系統用來找出處理要求之端點的篩選器的類型。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A> property automatically closes the session when the channel is closed and the service has finished processing any remaining messages.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>屬性就會自動關閉工作階段，當通道關閉，而且服務已完成處理任何剩餘的訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> property controls the internal threading model, enabling support for reentrant or multithreaded services.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>屬性會控制內部執行緒模型，以便支援可重新進入或多執行緒服務。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A> property is used to declare a name for use in the `name` attribute of the `<service>` element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>屬性用來宣告的名稱以用於`name`屬性`<service>`組態檔中的項目。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> property enables the run time to ignore extra serialization information that is not required to process the message.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>屬性可讓執行的階段略過不需要處理訊息的額外序列化資訊。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property specifies whether unhandled exceptions in a service are returned as SOAP faults.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>屬性會指定是否在服務中的未處理例外狀況會當做 SOAP 錯誤傳回。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is for debugging purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 這是僅限偵錯。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> property specifies whether and when services and their service objects are to be recycled during an exchange with a client.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>屬性會指定是否與服務和其服務物件要與用戶端交換期間會回收。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> property to limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>屬性來限制物件圖形中序列化的項目數目。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> properties control the name and namespace for the WSDL expression of the service element.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>屬性控制的 WSDL 項目的運算式服務的命名空間與名稱。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> property specifies whether the service object is recycled when a transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>屬性會指定在異動完成時，是否回收服務物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A> property specifies whether outstanding transactions are completed when the session closes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>屬性會指定要在工作階段關閉時完成未完成的交易。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A> property specifies the transaction isolation level that the contract supports.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>屬性會指定合約支援的交易隔離等級。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A> property specifies the time period within which a transaction must complete or it aborts.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>屬性指定的時間週期內的交易必須完成或中止。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> property indicates whether to synchronize inbound method calls with the user interface thread automatically.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>屬性會指出是否會自動在使用者介面執行緒與同步處理傳入的方法呼叫。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>屬性會通知系統是否要確認的 SOAP 標頭標記為`MustUnderstand`，事實上，已實際瞭解。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property can also be set using an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>屬性也可以設定使用應用程式組態檔。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The default values for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute> are: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>是:-<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A>設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AddressFilterMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.AutomaticSessionShutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A> property is the namespace-qualified name of the type without the assembly information.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>屬性是不含組件資訊之型別的命名空間限定名稱。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> property is set to 64KB.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>屬性設定為 64 KB。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A> property is the name of the service type, without namespace or assembly information.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>屬性是服務類型，不含命名空間或組件資訊的名稱。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A> property is "http://tempuri.org".
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>屬性是"http://tempuri.org"。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.Namespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> is `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A> is `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.UseSynchronizationContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A> property is <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>.</xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero>.</xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout%2A> -

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ValidateMustUnderstand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref>由發送器用來將傳入訊息路由至正確的端點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> object that is used by the dispatcher to route incoming messages to the correct endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"> </xref>由發送器用來將傳入訊息路由至正確的端點的物件。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.AddressFilterMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to automatically close a session when a client closes an output session.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要自動關閉工作階段時用戶端關閉輸出工作階段。

trans-unit.source: By default when a client closes an output session and the service has finished processing any remaining messages the server closes the session.
trans-unit.target: 依預設，當用戶端關閉輸出工作階段，且服務已完成處理任何剩餘的訊息伺服器會關閉工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Setting AutomaticSessionShutdown to `false` prevents the server from automatically closing the session and enables custom control of session lifetimes.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 AutomaticSessionShutdown`false`防止伺服器自動關閉工作階段並啟用工作階段存留期的自訂控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if services automatically close a session when the client closes an output session; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服務會自動關閉工作階段，當用戶端關閉輸出工作階段。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a service supports one thread, multiple threads, or reentrant calls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務是支援單一執行緒、 多重執行緒或可重新進入的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This property indicates whether an instance of a service can handle one thread or multiple threads that execute concurrently, and if single-threaded, whether reentrancy is supported.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出是否在服務的執行個體可以處理單一執行緒或同時也會執行的多個執行緒，如果單一執行緒是否會支援重新進入。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ConcurrencyMode property interacts with some other settings.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ConcurrencyMode 屬性與其他設定互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> value is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the ConcurrencyMode value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>值設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>結果是您的服務可以只處理一個訊息一次除非您也可以設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> ConcurrencyMode 值</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property also produces behavior in combination with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也會產生結合的行為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段、 執行個體，以及並行](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> instructs the system to restrict instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, which frees you from dealing with threading issues.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>至<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>會指示系統要將服務的執行個體限制一次，這樣您就不需要處理執行緒問題執行一個執行緒。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> means that service objects can be executed by multiple threads at any one time.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>表示服務物件可以由多個執行緒執行一次。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must ensure thread safety.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須確保執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> also restricts access to a single thread at a time; while the operation is processing, no other message can enter the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>也會為單一執行緒存取限制一次。當作業正在處理時，沒有其他訊息進入作業。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: If during the operation a call to another service leaves, the current message loses the lock on the operation, which is free to process other messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業期間離開呼叫另一個服務，目前訊息便會失去上作業，可任意處理其他訊息的鎖定。

trans-unit.source: When the service call out returns, the lock is reestablished and the original message can continue processing to its conclusion or until another call out of the operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當服務呼叫傳回時，鎖定會重新建立，而且原始訊息可以繼續處理其總結，或是直到另一個作業呼叫，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Even though <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> restricts instances of the service to one thread of execution at a time, you must also set <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A> to 1 to guarantee no out-of-order messages.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 即使<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>限制執行個體要一次執行一個執行緒服務，您也必須設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A>設為 1，保證沒有次序不對的訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceThrottlingBehavior.MaxConcurrentCalls%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: > > Also, it is your responsibility to leave your object state consistent before callouts and you must confirm that operation-local data is valid after callouts.
trans-unit.target: >> 此外，它是保持物件狀態一致的圖說文字之前，您必須負責，而且您必須確認作業本機資料 callout 後都有效。

trans-unit.source: Note that the service instance is unlocked only by calling another service over a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] channel.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，服務執行個體才能解除鎖定僅透過呼叫另一個服務[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]通道。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the called service can reenter the first service via a callback.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，被呼叫的服務可重新進入第一個服務透過回呼。

trans-unit.source: If the first service is not reentrant, the sequence of calls results in a deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一個服務不是可重新進入，呼叫的順序會產生死結。

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: During any outbound call from a processing operation, data not local to the operation can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 在處理作業處理任何傳出呼叫，期間修改的資料不是本機作業。

trans-unit.source: (Local state data is guaranteed to be valid when the original message resumes processing.) As a result, before your outbound call you must ensure that non-local data is valid for other incoming calls and revalidate non-local data after the outbound call returns.
trans-unit.target: （本機狀態資料保證時，能夠有效原始訊息繼續處理）。如此一來，在傳出呼叫之前您必須確保非本機資料對其他傳入呼叫是有效的並在傳出呼叫傳回之後，重新驗證非本機資料。

trans-unit.source: The following pseudo-code illustrates the required pattern for successful reentrant support.
trans-unit.target: 下列虛擬程式碼將示範順利重新進入支援的必要的模式。

trans-unit.source: ```c# public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ``` Using the Begin/End asynchronous call pattern for an outbound call when the ConcurrencyMode is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> triggers an exception.
trans-unit.target: ```c# public void MyMethod() { this.SomeNonLocalDataState; // Here you need to clean nonlocal state for other users OutboundProxy proxy = new OutboundProxy(); int returnValue = proxy.CallOutOfOperation(); // Ensure that this.SomeNonLocalDataState is valid for continued use. this.ModifyNonLocalState; return returnValue; } ```ConcurrencyMode 時傳出呼叫使用 Begin/End 非同步呼叫模式<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>觸發例外狀況。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous outbound calls require an operation in which ConcurrencyMode is <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>, in which case you must handle synchronization issues.
trans-unit.target: 非同步傳出呼叫需要 ConcurrencyMode 是的作業<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>，在此情況下，您必須處理同步處理問題。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: Generally, if a message arrives for an instance that violates its concurrency mode, the message waits until the instance is available, or until it times out.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，如果違反其並行模式的執行個體的訊息到達，該訊息會等到執行個體可供使用，或逾時為止。

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> and a reentrant call is blocked while waiting for the instance to be freed, the system detects the deadlock and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>設<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>和可重新進入的呼叫會遭到封鎖，等待釋放執行個體時，系統就會偵測到死結並擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown at runtime if <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> is `true` when the ConcurrencyMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果在執行階段擲回<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>是`true`當 ConcurrencyMode 屬性設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> </xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: Note that you must explicitly set <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> to `false` if there is an operation with <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> set to true and you set ConcurrencyMode to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，您必須明確設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>至`false`如果與作業<xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設為 true，且您 ConcurrencyMode 設<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.TransactionScopeRequired%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise a validation exception is thrown because the default value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 否則因為會擲回驗證例外狀況的預設值<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is an interaction of the ConcurrencyMode and other properties that can alter runtime behavior.
trans-unit.target: 沒有 ConcurrencyMode 和其他屬性，可以改變執行階段行為的互動。

trans-unit.source: For a complete description of these interactions, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](../Topic/Sessions,%20Instancing,%20and%20Concurrency.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這些互動的完整說明，請參閱[工作階段、 執行個體，以及並行](../Topic/Sessions,%20Instancing,%20and%20Concurrency.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref> values; the default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref>值; 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value used to locate the service element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，用於在應用程式組態檔中尋找服務項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this value to specify a particular service in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定特定的服務組態檔中使用此值。

trans-unit.source: The value to locate in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 要在組態檔中尋找的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the fully qualified type name without assembly information.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是不含組件資訊的完整限定的類型名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value is null.
trans-unit.target: 值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 值為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service ordered dispatch is ensured.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否確保已排序服務分派。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the service ordered dispatch is ensured; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果已排序的服務分派會確保;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an object that implements the service and that is used as the singleton instance of the service, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no singleton instance.
trans-unit.target: 擷取實作服務，可做為服務之單一執行個體的物件或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果沒有單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A non-`null` value provides the service instance to which all messages addressed to the service will be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 非`null`值提供分派定址到該服務的所有訊息的服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服務實作。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to send unknown serialization data onto the wire.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否要傳送到網路上的未知的序列化資料。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unknown serialization data is never sent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果絕不傳送未知的序列化資料;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies that general unhandled execution exceptions are to be converted into a <xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException%601?displayProperty=fullName> of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail?displayProperty=fullName> and sent as a fault message.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定一般未處理的執行例外狀況轉換成<xref:System.ServiceModel.FaultException%601?displayProperty=fullName>型別的<xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail?displayProperty=fullName>並傳送為錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Set this to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> only during development to troubleshoot a service.
trans-unit.target: 將此設<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>只在疑難排解服務的開發。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if unhandled exceptions are to be returned as SOAP faults; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未處理例外狀況要當做 SOAP 錯誤，傳回，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that indicates when new service objects are created.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出何時建立新的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> property to specify when new service objects are created.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>屬性可指定何時建立新的服務物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: Because the service object is not directly connected to the communicating channel, the lifetime of the service objects is independent of the lifetime of the channel between a client and the service application.
trans-unit.target: 因為服務物件不會直接連接至通訊通道，就有一個服務物件的存留期無關的用戶端和服務應用程式之間的通道的存留期。

trans-unit.source: The default value, <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>, instructs the service application to create a new service object when a new communication session is established between a client and the service application.
trans-unit.target: 預設值， <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>，指示服務應用程式之間的用戶端和服務應用程式建立新的通訊工作階段時建立新的服務物件。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: Subsequent calls in the same session are handled by the same object.
trans-unit.target: 相同的工作階段中的後續呼叫會處理相同的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> indicates that each service object handles requests from one client channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>指出每個服務物件，處理來自一個用戶端通道的要求。</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The InstanceContextMode property interacts with some other settings.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > InstanceContextMode 屬性與其他設定互動。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the InstanceContextMode value is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> the result is that your service can only process one message at a time unless you also set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> value to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 InstanceContextMode 值設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>結果是您的服務可以只處理一個訊息一次，除非您也可以設定的<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A>值為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConcurrencyMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>

trans-unit.source: This property also produces behavior in combination with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也會產生結合的行為<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceContractAttribute.SessionMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Sessions, Instancing, and Concurrency](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作階段、 執行個體，以及並行](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For singleton lifetime behavior (for example, if the host application calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A> constructor and passes an object to use as the service), the service class must set InstanceContextMode to `Single`, or an exception is thrown at run time.
trans-unit.target: 針對單一存留期行為 (例如，如果主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A>建構函式和傳遞物件做為服務)，服務類別必須將 InstanceContextMode 設為`Single`，或在執行階段擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref> values; the default value is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref>值; 預設值是<xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是其中一個<xref href="System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of items allowed in a serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定序列化的物件中允許的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Use the MaxItemsInObjectGraph property set a limit on the number of items in an object graph that are serialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用 MaxItemsInObjectGraph 屬性設定的物件圖形中序列化的項目數的限制。

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property using the [\<dataContractSerializer\>](../Topic/%3CdataContractSerializer%3E.md) element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定此屬性使用[ \< dataContractSerializer\>](../Topic/%3CdataContractSerializer%3E.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of items allowed in an object.
trans-unit.target: 允許在物件中的項目數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 65536 bytes (64KB).
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 65536 個位元組 (64KB)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the name attribute in the service element in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務項目中 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 中的名稱屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the name attribute in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref> element when exported.
trans-unit.target: 中的名稱屬性的值<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref>匯出時的項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the target namespace for the service in Web Services Description Language (WSDL).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 服務的目標命名空間的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref> attribute for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:definitions>" name="<wsdl:definitions>" href=""></xref> element that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref uid="langword_csharp_targetNamespace" name="targetNamespace" href=""></xref>屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:definitions>" name="<wsdl:definitions>" href=""></xref>包含項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsdl:service>" name="<wsdl:service>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the service object is released when the current transaction completes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否要在目前交易完成時，釋放服務物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service object is to be released; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服務物件會釋出。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an object that implements the service and that is used as the singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: 指定實作服務，可做為服務之單一執行個體的物件。

trans-unit.source: This provides the service instance to which all messages addressed to the service will be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 這會提供分派定址到該服務的所有訊息的服務執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If SetWellKnownSingleton is set to a non-`null` value, then the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定為非 SetWellKnownSingleton`null`值，然後在<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>必須設為<xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode>或<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContextMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The singleton instance of the service.
trans-unit.target: 此服務之單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The value set is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 設定的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ConfigurationName*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseServiceInstanceOnTransactionComplete*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionAutoCompleteOnSessionClose*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionIsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>屬性已經從其預設值，且應該序列化。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>屬性值應該序列化，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.TransactionTimeout*>

trans-unit.source: Passes custom data objects to the bindings that support the behavior properties.
trans-unit.target: 將自訂資料物件傳遞至支援此行為屬性的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The data objects needed by bindings to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 資料物件，以支援行為所需的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Customizes the service run time to support the behavior properties.
trans-unit.target: 自訂服務執行階段以支援此行為屬性。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Confirms that the service description and service host are capable of supporting the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 確認的服務描述和服務主機能夠支援此行為。

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether pending transactions are completed when the current session closes without error.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否完成擱置的交易不會發生錯誤的目前工作階段關閉時。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if pending transactions are to be completed when the current session closes without error; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要在目前的工作階段關閉不會發生錯誤; 完成會暫止的交易否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the transaction isolation level for new transactions created inside the service, and incoming transactions flowed from a client.
trans-unit.target: 指定之新交易的交易隔離等級內建立服務，以及來自用戶端的傳入交易。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level in which your transaction runs determines how data is treated when changes are made in other transactions and how long your transaction must hold locks to protect against these changes.
trans-unit.target: 在其中決定變更時如何處理資料異動所執行的隔離等級在其他交易和您的交易必須保持鎖定，以免受到這些變更影響的時間長度。

trans-unit.source: For example, the default value, <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>, specifies that no updating or inserting can occur until the transaction is complete.
trans-unit.target: 例如，預設值， <xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>，指定任何更新或插入，可以發生直到交易完成為止。</xref:System.Transactions.IsolationLevel>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to restrict the isolation level of incoming transactions flowed from a client.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也可用來限制隔離層級的傳入交易來自用戶端。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> value that specifies the transaction isolation level.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref>值，指定交易隔離等級。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the period within which a transaction must complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定交易必須完成的期間。

trans-unit.source: This value sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcher.TransactionTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also set this property using the [\<serviceTimeouts\>](../Topic/%3CserviceTimeouts%3E.md) element in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定此屬性使用[ \< serviceTimeouts\>](../Topic/%3CserviceTimeouts%3E.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> object that represents the time within which transactions must complete or be automatically aborted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件，代表交易必須完成或自動中止的時間。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The value is null.
trans-unit.target: 值為 null。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName> or greater than <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 值是小於<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=fullName>或大於<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use the current synchronization context to choose the thread of execution.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指定是否要使用目前的同步化內容來選擇執行的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to provide the user interface thread affinity that some applications require.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性來提供某些應用程式需要的使用者介面執行緒相似性。

trans-unit.source: For example, a Windows Forms application may be registered as a singleton service object.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows Forms 應用程式可能會註冊為單一服務物件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, all calls into the service must run on the Windows Forms thread.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，對服務的所有呼叫必須在 Windows Forms 執行緒上都執行。

trans-unit.source: The default case, in which UseSynchronizationContext is set to `true`, synchronizes all calls to the service to run on the thread captured from the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設情況下，UseSynchronizationContext 設為`true`，同步處理服務在從<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext?displayProperty=fullName>所擷取的執行緒上執行的所有呼叫

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all calls to the service must run on the thread specified by the <xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果服務的所有呼叫必須在所指定的執行緒上都執行<xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Threading.SynchronizationContext>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> header processing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指定是否在系統或應用程式會強制執行 SOAP <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""> </xref>標頭處理。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidateMustUnderstand property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉對抵達的訊息標頭的強制驗證使用 ValidateMustUnderstand 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In normal execution, message headers are compared against the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A> property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: 在正常執行中，訊息標頭加以比較<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A>屬性來確認服務已明確地處理抵達的標頭。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.UnderstoodHeaders%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this to `false` to disable this checking.
trans-unit.target: 將此設`false`停用這項檢查。

trans-unit.source: When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為`false`，應用程式必須檢查標頭標示為 MustUnderstand ="true"，並傳回錯誤，如果一或多個無法了解。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any incoming SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式應該接受任何內送 SOAP 訊息 （例如，當使用具型別或不具類型的訊息），以及執行自訂標頭處理時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system is to perform SOAP header <xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref> processing; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the application performs this processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系統来執行 SOAP 標頭<xref uid="langword_csharp_MustUnderstand" name="MustUnderstand" href=""></xref>處理，否則為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，表示應用程式會執行這項處理。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
